title: Catherine Cesarsky - Wikipedia
snippet: Born in France, Catherine Cesarsky was largely raised in Argentina and she received a degree in physical sciences at the University of Buenos Aires. She graduated with a PhD in astronomy in 1971 from Harvard University (Cambridge, Mass., USA).

title: Dr. Catherine Cesarsky | ESO
snippet: Born in France, Catherine Cesarsky received a degree in Physical Sciences at the University of Buenos Aires and graduated with a PhD in Astronomy in 1971 from Harvard University (Cambridge, Mass., USA). She worked at the California Institute of Technology. In 1974, she moved to France, becoming ...

title: L'invitée/Catherine Cesarsky
snippet: Catherine Cesarsky: Cela s’est fait par hasard. En réalité, au départ, je suis une théoricienne. J’ai étudié la physique en Argentine (où j’ai vécu depuis mon enfance), puis réalisé ma thèse en astrophysique théorique à l’Université de Harvard.

title: Dr Catherine Cesarsky | SKAO
snippet: Born in France and raised in Argentina, Catherine Cesarsky received a degree in Physical Sciences at the University of Buenos Aires.
